key_files.snippet:
## Setup

Install deps: `npm install`. Run: `npm run dev` or `docker compose up`.

## Usage

See docs.

FROM node:20
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .
RUN npm ci
CMD ["npm", "run", "start"]

workflows.snippet:
name: CI
on: [push]
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - run: npm test
